thread.title: 25 Quick Vegan Dinners Anyone Can Make
thread.title_full: 25 Quick Vegan Dinners Anyone Can Make

author: Whitney Jefferson
title: 25 Quick Vegan Dinners Anyone Can Make

organizations.name: lemon pepper pasta blissful basil / blissfulbasil.com  blissful basil

text:
View this image › 
Jenny Chang / BuzzFeed ID: 10692210 1. Vegan Ratatouille View this image › 
Olives For Dinner / olivesfordinner.com You can have the goodness of ratatouille without the meat. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10673425 2. Creamy Garlic and Lemon Pepper Pasta Blissful Basil / blissfulbasil.com 
Blissful Basil / blissfulbasil.com 
  This creamy pasta dish comes together in less than 30 minutes. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10629838 3. Zucchini Noodle Ramen with Tempeh View this image › 
Brittany Mullins / eatingbirdfood.com Using zucchini in the place of noodles can actually speed up the cook time of your regular ramen recipe. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10553491 4. Avocado “Egg” Rolls Savory Tooth / savorytooth.com 
Savory Tooth / savorytooth.com 
  It’s as easy as placing the avocados, tomatoes, salt and pepper onto an egg roll, rolling them up, and then lightly frying the whole roll. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10630295 5. Spicy Pumpkin and Balsamic Pizza View this image › 
Veggieful / veggieful.com This easy pizza with a unique flavor combination comes together in a flash. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10666718 6. Chickpea Taco Buddha Bowl Diary of an Ex-Sloth / exsloth.com 
Diary of an Ex-Sloth / exsloth.com 
  For this bowl of goodness, you just have to chop up the veggies while your chickpeas cook. Easy! Get the recipe here .
ID: 10553584 7. Creamy Vegetable Risotto View this image › 
No Face Plate / nofaceplate.blogspot.com Get that comforting taste that’s perfect for cold nights with this easy-to-make recipe .
ID: 10673679 8. Buffalo White Bean Chili with Veggie Sausage Foodness Gracious / foodnessgracious.com 
Foodness Gracious / foodnessgracious.com 
  Spice your soup up a bit with this buffalo take on chili. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10553514 9. Quinoa Chickpea Cakes View this image › 
Pure Thyme / purethyme.com These mini chickpea cakes bake perfectly in muffin tins. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10666746 10. Raw Fettuccine Alfredo View this image › 
Rawified / rawified.blogspot.ca This simple recipe uses two zucchini as noodles and a cashew sauce made in your blender. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10673379 11. Tomato Tart View this image › 
What The Hell Does A Vegan Eat Anyway? / veganmenu.blogspot.com One sheet of puff pastry + tomatoes + spices = a tasty meal. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10673613 12. Chickpea “Tuna” Avocado Boats Making Thyme For Health / makingthymeforhealth.com 
Making Thyme For Health / makingthymeforhealth.com 
  Get your “tuna” fix with this awesome and quick recipe .
ID: 10553600 13. Beer Cheese And “Bacon” Loaded Potato Skins View this image › 
For Reals Life / forealslife.com If you’re vegan, it’s probably been a while since you’ve knocked back some potato skins. Now’s the time to try again with this recipe .
ID: 10673668 14. Warm Roasted Winter Salad Bowl Oh She Glows / ohsheglows.com 
Oh She Glows / ohsheglows.com 
  Green beans, potatoes, kale, pepitas, and quinoa — sounds like the makings of a healthy dinner to me! Get the recipe here .
ID: 10673658 15. Vegan Falafel View this image › 
Gourmandelle / gourmandelle.com A falafel recipe fit for salads, wraps, or full mediterranean platter. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10673474 16. Quinoa Sushi View this image › 
Fragrant Vanilla Cake / fragrantvanilla.com Sushi in it’s most conscious form. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10673525 17. Scallion Pancakes View this image › 
Radishes and Rhubarb / radishesandrhubarb.com It couldn’t be easier to make this quick recipe , just add flour to a handful of ingredients and you’re done!
ID: 10673592 18. Quinoa Collard Wraps View this image › 
Golubka Kitchen / golubkakitchen.com A beautiful spiral of rainbow ingredients. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10673417 19. Creamy Avocado Carbonara View this image › 
Crunch and Chew / crunchandchew.wordpress.com A little avocado goes a long way. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10666775 20. Seven-Layer Tostadas View this image › 
Where Do You Get Your Protein? / whereyougetyourprotein.com Delicious and easy to put together. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10553621 21. Savory Tofu Turnovers View this image › 
Vegan Mother Hubbard / veganmotherhubbard.net While this can be made with virtually any of the veggies you have left in your fridge, this recipe opts for mushrooms and asparagus.
ID: 10673389 22. Veggie Pot Pie The Kitchn / thekitchn.com 
The Kitchn / thekitchn.com 
  What’s more comforting than a savory pot pie? The answer is nothing, and if you disagree with me, go ahead and try this recipe and then get back to me.
ID: 10673612 23. Naan Flatbread Pizza View this image › 
The Simple Veganista / thesimpleveganista.tumblr.com It’s as easy as topping a piece of naan with whatever you’d like. This recipe uses a tofu ricotta, red onions, and zucchini.
ID: 10673617 24. Teriyaki Veggie Rolls View this image › 
Margaret Helthaler / veggieprimer.com Pulse your veggies in a blender or food processor, then just roll ‘em up! Get the recipe here .
ID: 10553561 25. Corn Chowder View this image › 
No Face Plate / nofaceplate.blogspot.com A veganized staple that you can spice up with jalapeños …or not. Get the recipe here .
ID: 10666792 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
